splits.name: sid_overview_registers
splits.description: SID chip overview, 6581 vs 8580 differences, complete register map ($D400-$D41C) - voice frequency, pulse width, control register waveform bits, ADSR envelope registers, filter registers, read-only registers

splits.name: sid_adsr_waveforms
splits.description: SID ADSR envelope generator timing table (attack/decay/release rates), ADSR bug explanation, waveform details (triangle, sawtooth, pulse, noise), combined waveform behavior

splits.name: sid_frequency_filter_modulation
splits.description: SID frequency calculation formulas, PAL/NTSC note frequency tables (C0-B7), filter modes (lowpass/bandpass/highpass), cutoff frequency, resonance, oscillator synchronization, ring modulation

splits.name: sid_programming_techniques
splits.description: SID programming - voice 3 as modulation source (vibrato/tremolo/filter sweeps), initialization code, playing notes, PWM effects, music engine structure, raster-synchronized playback, sound effect examples

splits.name: sid_digi_patches_quirks_reference
splits.description: SID sample playback (4-bit digi via volume register), typical instrument patches table, pinout reference, known quirks and bugs (ADSR bug, noise lockup, write-only registers, filter distortion), register quick reference card
